attributes.action: Please take note of the sacrifice of Christian Nock in the name of homelessness.
attributes.additional_details:
Christian Nock, an ex serving member of the armed forces, is walking 6500 miles around the entire coast of the UK, sleeping rough every night.
His sacrifice is to raise awareness of the fact that many ex-sevice staff are homeless after leaving the forces.
We petition you to make a statement that the government will work to make this a thing of the past, and to look after forces staff that have served for their country.
These people deserve the utmost care in our system, having risked life and limb for their fellow countrymen, and should not be left to rot on the streets.
